tf2Pose1.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python3
2 import rospy
3 
4 import math
5 import tf2_ros
6 from turtlesim.msg import Pose
7 from tf.transformations import euler_from_quaternion
8 import sys
9 
10 if __name__ == '__main__':
11  rospy.init_node('flipbot_tf_listener_1')
12  rospy.loginfo("initiating transform look up for bot : " + str(sys.argv[1]))
13  bot_id = "marker_id"+sys.argv[1]
14  bot_publisher = "flipbot"+str(sys.argv[1])+"/pose"
15  tfBuffer = tf2_ros.Buffer()
16  listener = tf2_ros.TransformListener(tfBuffer)
17 
18  turtle_pose = rospy.Publisher(bot_publisher, Pose, queue_size=1)
19 
20  rate = rospy.Rate(50.0)
21  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
22  try:
23  trans = tfBuffer.lookup_transform(
24  'usb_cam',bot_id, rospy.Time())
25  except (tf2_ros.LookupException, tf2_ros.ConnectivityException, tf2_ros.ExtrapolationException):
26  rate.sleep()
27  continue
28 
29  msg = Pose()
30  q = [trans.transform.rotation.x, trans.transform.rotation.y,
31  trans.transform.rotation.z, trans.transform.rotation.w]
32  roll, pitch, yaw = euler_from_quaternion(q)
33  msg.x = trans.transform.translation.x
34  msg.y = trans.transform.translation.y
35  msg.theta=yaw
36  turtle_pose.publish(msg)
37 
38  rate.sleep()
